item.title: BD2 p3
item.content:encoded:
What I've Done

  • Spent time learning about the Separating Axis Theorem and how to apply it to collision detection in the form of an Axis Aligned Bounding Box
  • Made a very primitive set of utility functions for calculating AABB to AABB and Circle to AABB collisions
  • made a texture for the bricks
  • Added a paddle to the screen (moveable by left and right keys, and the ball interacts with it)

Screen Shot (s)

  • Fix occasional stutter
  • Refactor
  • Add scoring
  • Add ball hold/release on paddle

item.title: BD2 p1
item.content:encoded:
Creating something always feels good!

What I've Done

  • Created start menu with new game and exit functionality, a background, and the Mighty Kraken logo. All rough versions, of course.
  • Setup the transition from the start menu to the play board
  • Added a ball that bounces around the screen
  • Limited the FPS to 30, which makes the animations a little smoother than just letting it run willy nilly

Screen Shot

Technical Stuff

I'm using love2d for everything I possibly can, which means I'm programming in Lua.
